mapper.select: SELECT FREE_POSTNUM, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT, FREE_VIEWS, FREE_REGDATE, MEMBER_LEVEL FROM FREEBOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREEBOARD (FREE_POSTNUM, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT,FREE_VIEWS, FREE_REGDATE) VALUES(FREE_POSTNUM.NEXTVAL,#{member_id},#{member_name}, #{free_title}, #{free_content},0,SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO FREEBOARD (FREE_POSTNUM.NEXTVAL, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT,FREE_VIEWS, SYSDATE, MEMEBER_LEVEL) VALUES(FREE_POSTNUM.NEXTVAL,#{member_id},#{member_name}, #{free_title}, #{free_content},0,SYSDATE,#{member_level})
mapper.update: UPDATE FREEBOARD SET FREE_TITLE= #{free_title}, FREE_CONTENT= #{free_content} WHERE FREE_POSTNUM = #{free_postnum}
UPDATE FREEBOARD SET FREE_VIEWS = FREE_VIEWS + 1 WHERE FREE_POSTNUM = #{free_postnum}
